title: Preventing rheumatism - is that possible? / Prevent the onset of the disease with medication...
description: 30.12.2023 – 09:00 Word & Image Publishing Group – health reports Baierbrunn (ots) Hands, fingers, toes, but…
content:
Hands, fingers, toes, but also shoulders, knees and hip joints can be affected: an estimated 700,000 adults in this country suffer from rheumatoid arthritis. The cause is a misdirected immune reaction: cells of the immune system not only attack viruses or bacteria, but also joints. These swell, feel stiff for a long time in the morning and can become deformed or even destroyed without treatment. How nice it would be if a drug could stop the outbreak of the disease beforehand, as a study recently carried out with the rheumatism drug Abatacept suggests: “The idea is to block an immune reaction using Abatacept brilliant,” says Prof. Hendrik Schulze-Koops, head of the Rheumatology and Clinical Immunology Section at the Ludwig Maximilians University Hospital in Munich, in the health magazine “Apotheken Umschau”.

But the rheumatologist also recognizes a dark side. This active ingredient must not be administered to people who do not suffer from rheumatism outside of scientific studies – not even for prevention. Many more years of intensive testing are required, explains Schulze-Koops. “For me as a researcher this is extremely interesting, but as a doctor I see it as only a faint glimmer of hope for the next generation or the generation after that.”

The good news: Everyone can do a lot to ensure that the disease does not break out or is milder despite a genetic predisposition. Very important: don’t smoke, pay attention to a healthy diet, lose excess weight and avoid constant stress. These strategies all have a more or less regulating effect on the immune system and can thus have a positive influence on the development and progression of rheumatoid arthritis. Ultimately, the joint disease provides another reason to stop smoking in the new year. There is also evidence in scientific studies that smoking can also lead to rheumatism symptoms outside the joints and increase the risk of cardiovascular, metabolic, lung diseases and infections.

This report is only free for publication if the source is cited. The health magazine “Apotheken Umschau” 12B/2023 is currently available in most pharmacies. Lots of other interesting health news can be found at and on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and YouTube.

entities.data: the Rheumatology and Clinical Immunology Section

summary: Rheumatoid arthritis affects an estimated 700,000 adults in the UK and can lead to swelling, stiffness, and even destruction of joints. A study conducted with the rheumatism drug Abatacept suggests that this could block an immune reaction using the drug. However, Prof. Hendrik Schulze-Koops, head of the Rheumatology and Clinical Immunology Section at the Ludwig Maximilians University Hospital in Munich, warns that it is only a faint glimmer of hope for future generations of rheumatologists. The good news is that individuals can control the disease, not necessarily by the genetic predisposition, but by avoiding smoking, a healthy diet, and avoiding constant stress can regulate the immune system.

title: Γερμανία: 3 συλλήψεις ισλαμιστών - Σχεδίαζαν επίθεση κατά του καθεδρικού ναού της Κολωνία την Πρωτοχρονιά
description: Η γερμανική αστυνομία ανακοίνωσε την σύλληψη τριών ισλαμιστών ως υπόπτων
content:
Η γερμανική αστυνομία ανακοίνωσε την σύλληψη τριών ισλαμιστών ως υπόπτων για συμμετοχή στο σχέδιο επίθεσης κατά του καθεδρικού ναού της Κολωνίας το βράδυ της Πρωτοχρονιάς με την βοήθεια «αυτοκινήτου».

Μία σύλληψη προηγήθηκε στο πλαίσιο της ίδιας υπόθεσης λίγο πριν από τα Χριστούγεννα, ενός Τατζίκου, σύλληψη η οποία έβαλε τις αστυνομικές αρχές στα ίχνη και άλλων υπόπτων και αποκάλυψε στοιχεία σχεδίου επίθεσης κατά του καθεδρικού ναού.

Παράλληλα, οι αυστριακές αρχές είχαν ανακοινώσει τότε την σύλληψη τριών υπόπτων στην Βιέννη. Οι ύποπτοι ανήκουν σε «οργανώσεις ισλαμιστών», διευκρίνισε ο τοπικός υπουργός Εσωτερικών Χέρμπερτ Ρόιλ κατά την διάρκεια συνέντευξης Τύπου. Εκπρόσωπος της αστυνομίας έκανε λόγο για «δίκτυο ατόμων που προέρχονται από την κεντρική Ασία».

Σύμφωνα με τις αρχές, αυτοκίνητο θα χρησιμοποιείτο στο σχέδιο επίθεσης, χωρίς να είναι γνωστό με ποιον ακριβώς τρόπο. Το υπόγειο πάρκινγκ του καθεδρικού ναού της Κολωνίας ερευνήθηκε με την βοήθεια εκπαιδευμένων σκύλων, αλλά δεν βρέθηκε κάτι ύποπτο. Η αστυνομία έχει ενισχύσει τα μέτρα ασφαλείας γύρω από τον καθεδρικό ναό εν όψει των εορτασμών για την Πρωτοχρονιά.

Σύμφωνα με τα γερμανικά μέσα ενημέρωσης, οι ύποπτοι που θεωρούνται μέλη του δικτύου είναι Τατζίκοι και ενεργούν για λογαριασμό του Ισλαμικού Κράτους-Χορασάν, της τοπικής πτέρυγας του Ισλαμικού Κράτους που δραστηριοποιείται στο Αφγανιστάν.

Το δίκτυο σχεδίαζε επιθέσεις κατά θρησκευτικών χώρων λατρείας κατά την περίοδο των γιορτών, τα Χριστούγεννα ή την Πρωτοχρονιά, στην Κολωνία, την Βιέννη ή την Μαδρίτη, σύμφωνα με τα γερμανικά μέσα ενημέρωσης.

Η Γερμανία βρίσκεται σε κατάσταση συναγερμού εδώ και πολλές εβδομάδες λόγω ανησυχιών για ισλαμιστικές επιθέσεις, κυρίως μετά την έναρξη του πολέμου του Ισραήλ στην Γάζα.
translation:
German police have announced the arrest of three Islamists on suspicion of involvement in a plot to attack Cologne Cathedral on New Year's Eve with the help of a "car".

An earlier arrest in the same case just before Christmas, of a Tajik man, put police on the trail of other suspects and revealed evidence of a planned attack on the cathedral.

At the same time, the Austrian authorities had then announced the arrest of three suspects in Vienna. The suspects belong to "Islamist organizations," the local interior minister Herbert Royle said during a press conference. A police spokesman spoke of a "network of people originating from central Asia".

According to the authorities, a car would be used in the attack plan, without it being known in what exact way. The underground car park of Cologne Cathedral was searched with the help of trained dogs, but nothing suspicious was found. Police have stepped up security around the cathedral ahead of New Year celebrations.

According to German media, the suspects believed to be members of the network are Tajik nationals and are acting on behalf of the Islamic State-Khorasan, the local wing of the Islamic State group operating in Afghanistan.

The network was planning attacks on religious places of worship during the holiday season, Christmas or New Year, in Cologne, Vienna or Madrid, according to German media.

Germany has been on high alert for several weeks due to concerns about Islamist attacks, especially after the start of Israel's war in Gaza.
translated_title: Germany: 3 Islamists Arrested - They Were Planning an Attack on Cologne Cathedral on New Years
translated_description: German police announced the arrest of three Islamists as suspects
translated_summary: German police have arrested three Islamists on suspicion of involvement in a plot to attack Cologne Cathedral on New Year's Eve. The arrests follow an earlier arrest of a Tajik man, which led to the discovery of evidence of a planned attack on the cathedral. The suspects are believed to be from central Asia and are acting on behalf of the Islamic State-Khorasan, the local wing of Islamic State group in Afghanistan. The underground car park of Cologne Cathedral was searched with trained dogs, but no suspicious items were found. Germany has been on high alert due to concerns about Islamist attacks, particularly after the start of Israel's war in Gaza.

title: Δημήτρης Νατσιός: Tο πρωτοχρονιάτικο μήνυμα για το  2024
description:
«Για τη Νίκη το 2024 θα είναι έτος οικογένειας όπως μας τη γνώρισαν οι πατεράδες μας, και από την οικογένεια και το σχολείο θα ξεκινήσει και η ανάσταση του λαού μας» αναφέρει, μεταξύ άλλων, στο πρωτοχρονιάτικο μήνυμά του ο πρόεδρος του κόμματος, Δημήτρης Νατσιός.
Στις ευχές του για το νέο έτος ...
content:
«Για τη Νίκη το 2024 θα είναι έτος οικογένειας όπως μας τη γνώρισαν οι πατεράδες μας, και από την οικογένεια και το σχολείο θα ξεκινήσει και η ανάσταση του λαού μας» αναφέρει, μεταξύ άλλων, στο πρωτοχρονιάτικο μήνυμά του ο πρόεδρος του κόμματος, Δημήτρης Νατσιός.

Στις ευχές του για το νέο έτος ο πρόεδρος της Νίκης αναφέρει:

«Νέα χρονιά σε λίγες ημέρες, πάει ο παλιός ο χρόνος ας γιορτάσουμε μικροί και μεγάλοι, γιορτάζουμε για το χρόνο που έρχεται γιατί ελπίζουμε να ζήσουμε καλύτερες ημέρες.

Θυμάμαι αυτές τις ημέρες να μου λένε οι μαθητές μου: " Κύριε, σήμερα έχει καλοσύνη" και εννοούσαν μια ηλιόλουστη ημέρα. Αυτό επιθυμούμε όλοι μας για το 2024.

Ημέρες καλοσύνης, της καλοσύνης του Χριστού μας, του νοητού ήλιου της δικαιοσύνης. Είναι ωραίες οι γιορτές των Χριστουγέννων γιατί προβάλλεται η σημαντικότερη αξία της ζωής, η οικογένεια και τι είναι οικογένεια; Μια αγκαλιά προσώπων που αγαπιούνται.

Η οικογένεια είναι η νέα και η έσχατη μεγάλη του γένους σχολή, εξάλλου αυτό σημαίνει πατρίδα , πολλές οικογένειες. Αν προοδεύει η οικογένεια προοδεύει η πατρίδα.

Για τη Νίκη, το 2024 θα είναι έτος οικογένειας όπως μας τη γνώρισαν οι πατεράδες μας, της παραδοσιακής ρωμαίικης οικογένειας. Θα αγωνιστούμε με όλο μας το σθένος κυρίως για τα παιδιά μας. Κατανοούμε ότι ο λαός μας περνάει δύσκολες στιγμές , το αποτυχημένο πολιτικό σύστημα τον οδήγησε στη βαθιά οικονομική κρίση, πλήγωσε την αξιοπρέπεια του με προδοσίες όπως της Μακεδονίας, τον οδήγησε στο ξεπούλημα της περιουσίας του, στη δημογραφική του πανωλεθρία, στην ανήκουστη εγκληματικότητα νέων ανθρώπων, στη λαθρομετανάστευση που σχεδόν ακυρώνει την επανάσταση του '21 και στη φυγή πολλών νέων μας στα ξένα. Όμως ας μην πτοούμαστε , είμαστε Έλληνες και άλλες φορές αλεστήκαμε στις μυλόπετρες της ιστορίας, αλλά ιδού ζώμεν, πάντα μένει η μαγιά που φουσκώνει το ζυμάρι.

Γιορτάζομε την πρωτοχρονιά και έναν από τους πιο αγαπητούς μας αγίους, τον Μέγα Βασίλειο, ας μην ξεχνάμε ότι μαζί με τους άλλους δυο Ιεράρχες , τους αγίους Γρηγόριο το Θεολόγο και Ιωάννη το Χρυσόστομο, είναι και προστάτες της παιδείας μας, της παιδείας που στηρίζεται στα γερά Ελληνικά γράμματα και όχι της σημερινής, με τα άθεα γράμματα που είναι ένα ύπουλο παιδομάζωμα.

Για τη Νίκη από την οικογένεια και το σχολείο θα ξεκινήσει και η ανάσταση του λαού μας, καλοί γονείς και δάσκαλοι ανατρέφουν και μορφώνουν παιδιά που θα πετούν ψηλά σαν τους περήφανους αετούς της ιστορίας μας. Θάρρος λοιπόν, ελπίδα και πίστη για τη νέα χρονιά. Θαύματα γίνονται και ένα θαύμα είναι και η παρουσία της Νίκης στη Βουλή για να υπερασπίζεται το λαό μας, τα όσια και τα ιερά του.

Η Νίκη και εγώ προσωπικά ευχόμαστε σε όλους τους Έλληνες και τις Ελληνίδες απανταχού της γης καλή και ευλογημένη χρονιά με ειρήνη, χαρά και υγεία. Να χαίρεστε τις οικογένειές σας, στηρίξτε μας για να σας βοηθήσουμε».
translation:
"For Niki, 2024 will be the year of the family as our fathers knew it, and the resurrection of our people will begin from the family and the school" states, among other things, in his New Year's message the president of the party, Dimitris Natsios .

In his wishes for the new year, the president of Nike states:

"New year in a few days, the old time is gone, let's celebrate young and old, we celebrate for the coming year because we hope to live better days.

I remember these days when my students said to me: "Lord, today is kind" and they meant a sunny day. This is what we all wish for in 2024.

Days of kindness, of the kindness of our Christ, of the conceivable sun of justice. Are the Christmas holidays nice because they highlight the most important value of life, the family and what is a family? An embrace of loved ones.

The family is the new and last great school of the genus, after all, this means homeland, many families. If the family progresses, the country progresses.

For Niki, 2024 will be the year of family as our fathers introduced it to us, of the traditional Roman family. We will fight with all our strength especially for our children. We understand that our people are going through difficult times, the failed political system led them to the deep economic crisis, hurt their dignity with betrayals like the one in Macedonia, led them to the sale of their property, to their demographic destruction, to the unheard of criminality of young people, to illegal immigration that almost cancels the revolution of '21 and the flight of many of our young people abroad. But let us not be dismayed, we are Greeks and at other times we have been ground in the millstones of history, but here we live, there always remains the yeast that swells the dough.

We celebrate the New Year and one of our most beloved saints, Basil the Great, let's not forget that together with the other two Hierarchs, Saints Gregory the Theologian and John the Chrysostom, they are also patrons of our education, the education that rests on the strong Greek letters and not today's, with the godless letters that are an insidious childish trick.

For Victory from the family and the school will also begin the resurrection of our people, good parents and teachers raise and train children who will fly high like the proud eagles of our history. So courage, hope and faith for the new year. Miracles happen and a miracle is also the presence of Niki in the Parliament to defend our people, their loyalties and sanctuaries.

Niki and I personally wish all Greek men and women all over the world a happy and blessed new year with peace, joy and health. Enjoy your families, support us to help you."
translated_title: Dimitris Natsios: The New Year's message for 2024
translated_description:
"For Niki, 2024 will be the year of the family as our fathers knew it, and the resurrection of our people will begin from the family and the school" states, among other things, in his New Year's message the president of the party, Dimitris Natsios .
In his wishes for the new year...
translated_summary: Dimitris Natsios, the president of the Greek party, has written a New Year's message for 2024, stating that it will be the year of the family as our fathers knew it, and the resurrection of our people will begin from the family and the school. Natsio also stated that the Greek people are experiencing difficult times, including a deep economic crisis, the sale of their property, the criminalization of young people, and illegal immigration. He also highlighted the importance of the traditional Roman family and their commitment to defending their people's loyalties and sanctuaries. The message includes a wish for peace, joy, and health for all Greek men and women.

title: To μήνυμα της Προέδρου της Δημοκρατίας για το 2024
description: «Οι πολεμικές συγκρούσεις στην ευρύτερη περιοχή μας, στην Ουκρανία και στη Μέση Ανατολή, φανερώνουν πόσο εύθραυστες είναι οι γεωπολιτικές ισορροπίες», ανέφερε η Κατερίνα Σακελλαροπούλου
content:
«Κανείς δεν επιτρέπεται να μένει εκτός του κοινωνικού μας συμβολαίου. Τα έθνη αντλούν τη δύναμή τους από την ενότητα, όχι από τους αποκλεισμούς και την εσωστρέφεια»: το μήνυμα αυτό αποστέλλει, μέσω της δήλωσής της για την έλευση του νέου έτους, η Πρόεδρος της Δημοκρατίας Κατερίνα Σακελλαροπούλου. Με αναφορές στα μεγάλα διεθνή (Ουκρανία, Μέση Ανατολή), αλλά και εγχώρια γεγονότα του 2023 (σιδηροδρομικό δυστύχημα στα Τέμπη, πυρκαγιές, πλημμύρες, οπαδική βία), αξιολογεί τη μεταρρύθμιση του κράτους και την αποτελεσματικότερη λειτουργία του ως «το μεγάλο μας στοίχημα». Ενώ για τα ελληνοτουρκικά, σημειώνει με έμφαση ότι «επενδύουμε με συνέπεια στο καλό και εποικοδομητικό κλίμα, που θα επιτρέψει την εμβάθυνση της συνεργασίας και την αποφυγή των εντάσεων».

Ολόκληρο το μήνυμα της Προέδρου της Δημοκρατίας για το νέο έτος, έχει ως εξής:

To 2023 ήταν μια κρίσιμη χρονιά για τη χώρα μας και τον κόσμο. Πυκνή σε σημαντικά γεγονότα, καθώς διάγουμε την εποχή των κρίσεων και των ανατροπών, μέσα σε ένα ρευστό διεθνές περιβάλλον. Οι πολεμικές συγκρούσεις στην ευρύτερη περιοχή μας, στην Ουκρανία και στη Μέση Ανατολή, φανερώνουν πόσο εύθραυστες είναι οι γεωπολιτικές ισορροπίες και αναδεικνύουν την ευθύνη της πατρίδας μας να αποτελεί παράγοντα ειρήνης και σταθερότητας. Να διαλέγει τη σωστή πλευρά της ιστορίας, σεβόμενη το δίκαιο και την ηθική. Η Ελλάδα εξέφρασε έμπρακτα την αμέριστη στήριξή της στον ουκρανικό λαό, απέναντι στην παράνομη ρωσική εισβολή. Καταδίκασε τις απάνθρωπες επιθέσεις στο Ισραήλ και ανέλαβε πρωτοβουλίες για την αντιμετώπιση της ανθρωπιστικής κρίσης στη Γάζα, διαχωρίζοντας τους τρομοκράτες από τον παλαιστινιακό λαό και τα αιτήματά του. Στις σχέσεις μας με την Τουρκία, επενδύουμε με συνέπεια στο καλό και εποικοδομητικό κλίμα, που θα επιτρέψει την εμβάθυνση της συνεργασίας και την αποφυγή των εντάσεων.

Βιώσαμε, ωστόσο, τη χρονιά αυτή, επώδυνες στιγμές στο εσωτερικό. Η τραγωδία των Τεμπών μας πλήγωσε βαθιά και μας θύμωσε. Οι πυρκαγιές στη Ρόδο και στον Έβρο, καθώς και οι πλημμύρες στον Βόλο και στον θεσσαλικό κάμπο, μας έδειξαν την σκληρή και οδυνηρή όψη της κλιματικής κρίσης. Τα θλιβερά περιστατικά της οπαδικής βίας, με θύματα νέους ανθρώπους, συνιστούν συμπτώματα χρόνιων παθογενειών που δεν συνάδουν με τον πολιτισμό μας και την εικόνα που θέλουμε για τη χώρα μας. Σήμερα, ενώ η Ελλάδα διασφαλίζει τον δημοσιονομικό της χώρο και διαθέτει πολύτιμα αναπτυξιακά εργαλεία, ως ισότιμο μέλος στην Ευρωπαϊκή Ένωση, η μεταρρύθμιση του Κράτους και η αποτελεσματικότερη λειτουργία του είναι το μεγάλο μας στοίχημα. Δεν χωρεί πια καμιά αναβολή στη μάχη με την κακή πλευρά του εαυτού μας και στην εμπέδωση ενός νέου παραδείγματος. Με έμφαση στην αρχή της πρόληψης και στην αποτροπή των σύγχρονων απειλών και διακινδυνεύσεων. Η ασφάλεια και η εμπιστοσύνη των πολιτών είναι το θεμέλιο της συνύπαρξης και της κοινωνικής συνοχής. Το ίδιο και η καταπολέμηση των ανισοτήτων, η φροντίδα των μεσαίων στρωμάτων και των ευάλωτων ομάδων, σε συνθήκες υψηλού παγκόσμιου ανταγωνισμού και ακρίβειας που υπονομεύουν το βιοτικό επίπεδο. Μέλημά μας πρέπει είναι η συμπερίληψη, η αναγνώριση του διαφορετικού, η προσήλωση στο ιδανικό της ανοικτής, πλουραλιστικής και συνάμα δίκαιης κοινωνίας. Κανείς δεν επιτρέπεται να μένει εκτός του κοινωνικού μας συμβολαίου. Τα έθνη αντλούν τη δύναμή τους από την ενότητα, όχι από τους αποκλεισμούς και την εσωστρέφεια.

Το 2024 συμπληρώνονται πενήντα χρόνια από την αποκατάσταση της δημοκρατίας. Σε αυτόν τον μισό αιώνα, οι Έλληνες πέτυχαν πολλά, προόδευσαν, εδραίωσαν θεσμούς δημοκρατικούς και φιλελεύθερους. Η ελληνική ταυτότητα άνθησε μέσα στην ευρωπαϊκή. Ξεπεράσαμε, παρά το βαρύ τίμημα, ακόμη και τις πιο υπαρξιακές δυσκολίες, την οικονομική κρίση και αμέσως μετά την πανδημία. Κι αυτό επειδή παραμείναμε σταθεροί στις θεμελιώδεις αξίες, που ανατρέχουν στις βαθιές ρίζες του λαού μας. Επιβεβαιώσαμε τη θέση μας ανάμεσα στους εταίρους μας, αυτή που αρμόζει στην ιστορία μας και μας κάνει περήφανους στον αναπτυγμένο κόσμο. Η θέση όμως αυτή δεν είναι στατική, ούτε αναλλοίωτη. Απέναντι στις προκλήσεις και τις ριζικές μεταβολές του καιρού μας, όπως ακριβώς τα άτομα, έτσι τα κράτη και οι κοινωνίες καλούνται να προσαρμοστούν, να επινοήσουν ξανά τον εαυτό τους. Προστατεύοντας τα κεκτημένα τους και αφήνοντας πίσω τις πιο ανθεκτικές παθολογίες και αδυναμίες τους. Αξιοποιώντας με τόλμη και σύνεση τις ανεξάντλητες τεχνικές δυνατότητες και ελευθερίες της εποχής μας.

Εύχομαι σε όλες και όλους καλή χρονιά, με ευημερία και ευτυχία».

Διαβάστε τις Ειδήσεις σήμερα και ενημερωθείτε για τα πρόσφατα νέα.

 Ακολουθήστε το Skai.gr στο Google News και μάθετε πρώτοι όλες τις ειδήσεις.

title: Chief justice centers Supreme Court annual report on AI’s dangers
description: Source link
content:
Chief Justice John Roberts warned that courts will need to consider the proper use of artificial intelligence (AI), portraying it as a new frontier for change in an annual report that follows a turbulent year for the Supreme Court. “I predict that human judges will be around for a while,” Roberts wrote in his report.…

 

 

 

Source link
summary: Chief Justice John Roberts, the Supreme Court, has warned that courts will need to consider the proper use of artificial intelligence (AI) in their annual report, which he calls a new frontier for change. The warning comes in response to a period of turbulence for the court, which Roberts predicts will continue to see human judges as judges for a while. He also highlighted the dangers of AI in his report, predicting that human judges will remain relevant for a long time.

title: Les Fêtes gourmandes SLSJ animent le Grand marché
description: TERROIR. Fidèle à la tradition établie de laisser une large place aux producteurs et produits locaux, la Tournée des Chefs « Goûtez le Québec », a confié
content:
TERROIR. Fidèle à la tradition établie de laisser une large place aux producteurs et produits locaux, la Tournée des Chefs « Goûtez le Québec », a confié aux Fêtes Gourmandes du Saguenay—Lac-Saint-Jean le soin de prendre en charge Le Grand Marché.

« La sélection 2015 de producteurs et de transformateurs agroalimentaires des régions du Québec, pour l’ensemble de la Tournée des Chefs « Goûtez le Québec », regroupera plus de 160 entreprises à travers les différentes étapes de la Tournée. Ils ont franchi le filtre de qualité et ils seront sur place afin de présenter, vendre et surtout, faire déguster leurs saveurs régionales », mentionne Stéphane Malenfant, pdg de la Tournée.

La sélection 2015pour la partie des Fêtes gourmandes SLSJ regroupera les entreprises suivantes:

— La Fromagerie du Champ à la Meule

— Le Jardin-atelier de la Brunante

— La Fédération des producteurs d’oeufs du Québec
translation:
TERROIR. Faithful to the established tradition of giving ample space to local producers and products, the Tournée des Chefs “Taste Quebec” has entrusted the Fêtes Gourmandes du Saguenay—Lac-Saint-Jean with the responsibility of taking charge of Le Grand Marché.

“The 2015 selection of agri-food producers and processors from the regions of Quebec, for the entire “Taste Quebec” Chefs’ Tour, will bring together more than 160 companies across the different stages of the Tour. They have passed the quality filter and they will be on site to present, sell and above all, have their regional flavors tasted,” says Stéphane Malenfant, CEO of the Tour.

The 2015 selection for the SLSJ Gourmet Festival part will bring together the following companies:

— La Fromagerie du Champ à la Meule

— The Brunante garden-workshop

— The Federation of Quebec Egg Producers
translated_title: The SLSJ Gourmet Festivals bring life to the Grand Marché
translated_description: TERROIR. Faithful to the established tradition of giving ample space to local producers and products, the Tournée des Chefs “Taste Quebec” said
translated_summary: The Tournée des Chefs "Taste Quebec" has entrusted the Fêtes Gourmandes du Saguenay—Lac-Saint-Jean with the responsibility of overseeing Le Grand Marché. The festival will feature over 160 agri-food producers and processors from regions of Quebec, bringing together over 160 companies across various stages of the Tour. The selection includes La Fromagerie du Champ à la Meule, The Federation of Quebec Egg Producers, and The Brunante garden-workshop.

title: Mexico and Venezuela restart repatriation flights amid pressure to curb soaring migration to US
description: MEXICO CITY (AP) — Mexico and Venezuela announced Saturday that they have restarted repatriation flights of Venezuelan migrants in Mexico, the latest move by countries in the region to take on a flood of people travelling north to the United...
content:
MEXICO CITY (AP) — Mexico and Venezuela announced Saturday that they have restarted repatriation flights of Venezuelan migrants in Mexico, the latest move by countries in the region to take on a flood of people travelling north to the United States.

The move comes as authorities say at least 10,000 migrants a day have been arriving at the US-Mexico border, many of them asylum seekers. It also comes as a migrant caravan of thousands of people from across the region — largely Venezuelans — has trekked through southern Mexico this week.

The repatriation flights are part of an agreement made between regional leaders during a summit in Mexico in October that aimed to seek solutions for migration levels that show few signs of slowing down.

Mexico's Ministry of Foreign Relations said the two countries began repatriations with a flight on Friday and a second on Saturday in an effort to “strengthen their cooperation on migration issues.”

The statement also said the two countries plan to implement social and work programmes for those repatriated to Venezuela.

“Mexico and Venezuela reiterate their commitment to address the structural causes that fuel irregular migration in the region, and to achieve a humanitarian management of such flows,” the statement read.

Mexico's government said it previously carried out a similar repatriation flight last January 20 with 110 people.

Venezuelan authorities said Saturday that 207 Venezuelans had landed in Caracas on one of the latest flights.

Follow The Gleaner on X, formerly Twitter, and Instagram @JamaicaGleaner and on Facebook @GleanerJamaica. Send us a message on WhatsApp at 1-876-499-0169 or email us at onlinefeedback@gleanerjm.com or editors@gleanerjm.com.
summary: Mexico and Venezuela have resumed repatriation flights for Venezuelan migrants in Mexico, part of an agreement reached during a summit in October aimed at addressing the issue of immigration to the US. The move comes as authorities report at least 10,000 migrants a day arriving at the US-Mexico border, many of whom are asylum seekers, and as a migrant caravan of thousands of people from across the region, largely Venezuelans, has crossed southern Mexico this week. The Ministry of Foreign Relations stated that the repatriations were part of a strategy to strengthen cooperation on migration issues and implement social and work programmes for those repatriated. Mexico's government previously carried out a similar repatriation flight last January 20 with 110 people.

title: Houthi ships sunk as US repels attack on cargo vessel
description: US helicopters have repelled an attack by Houthi militants on a container vessel in the Red Sea, sinking three ships and killing 10 militants.
content:
US helicopters have repelled an attack by Iran-backed Houthi militants on a Maersk container vessel in the Red Sea, sinking three ships and killing 10 militants, according to accounts by American, Maersk, and Houthi officials.

The naval battle occurred about 3.30am on Sunday (local time) as the attackers sought to board the Singapore-flagged Maersk Hangzhou, Maersk and US Central Command (CENTCOM) said.

Helicopters from the USS Eisenhower and USS Gravely joined the ship’s security team in repelling the attackers after receiving a distress call, CENTCOM said.

Maersk said it would halt all sailing through the Red Sea for 48 hours after the attack.

A spokesman for the Houthis said the group carried out the attack because the ship’s crew refused to heed warning calls. He said 10 Houthi naval personnel were “dead and missing” after their boats were attacked by US forces in the Red Sea.

The naval battle underlines the risk of a regional escalation in fighting as Israel continues with its relentless bombing campaign following a Hamas surprise cross-border attack on Israeli towns on October 7 that left 1200 dead, and took 240 hostages.

Israel’s air and artillery bombardment has killed more than 21,800 people, according to Gazan health authorities.

Yemen’s Houthis have targeted vessels in the Red Sea since November to show their support for Hamas, prompting major shipping companies to take the longer and costlier route around the Africa’s Cape of Good Hope rather than through the Suez Canal.

The Red Sea is the entry point for ships using the Suez Canal, which handles about 12 per cent of global trade and is vital for the movement of goods between Asia and Europe.

The US launched Operation Prosperity Guardian on December 19, saying more than 20 countries had agreed to participate in the efforts to safeguard ships in Red Sea waters near Yemen.

Maersk, one of the world’s top cargo shippers, said on December 24 it would resume sailing through the Red Sea. However, attacks have continued and US allies have proven reluctant to commit to the coalition, with nearly half not declaring their presence publicly.

The botched Houthi boarding operation was the second attack on the Maersk Hangzhou in as many days. The ship, which is carrying 14,000 containers en route from Singapore, was on Saturday hit by a missile about 55 nautical miles south-west of Al Hodeidah, Yemen.

The shipping company said the Maersk Hangzhou’s crew was safe and there was no indication of fire onboard the vessel, which continued its journey north towards the Suez Canal.

White House national security spokesperson John Kirby declined to say what options the US is considering when asked on American TV’s Good Morning America if Washington would consider a pre-emptive strike on the Houthis.

“We have made it clear publicly to the Houthis, we’ve made it clear privately to our allies and partners in the region, that we take these threats seriously,” he said.

British Foreign Secretary David Cameron said on Sunday that he had told Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein Amirabdollahian in a call that Iran should help stop the Houthi attacks in the Red Sea.

“I made clear that Iran shares responsibility for preventing these attacks, given their longstanding support to the Houthis,” Cameron said in a post on social media site X, adding that the attacks “threaten innocent lives and the global economy”.

The BIMCO shipping association condemned the attacks and thanked the states involved in repelling them.

“We are thankful to US, French, and UK efforts so far and hope even more states will support the coalition with naval assets or other impactful means including diplomatic pressure on the Houthis and their sponsors,” Jakob Larsen, BIMCO’s head of maritime safety and security, told Reuters.
summary: US helicopters successfully repel an attack by Iran-backed Houthi militants on a Maersk container vessel in the Red Sea, which resulted in sinking three ships and killing 10 militants. The attack occurred about 3.30am on Sunday (local time) and was thwarted by helicopters from the USS Eisenhower and USS Gravely from the US Central Command (CENTCOM). The Houthis claimed the attack was carried out because the ship’s crew refused to heed warning calls. This incident raises the possibility of a regional escalation as Israel continues its relentless bombing campaign following a Hamas surprise cross-border attack on Israeli towns. The Red Sea is the entry point for ships using the Suez Canal, which handles about 12 per cent of global trade and is vital for the movement of goods between Asia and Europe.

title: NLC laments increasing insecurity
description: The Nigerian Labour Congress, on Sunday, lamented the rising state of insecurity, delay in wage implementation and economic hardship among others experienced in in 2023.
content:
The Nigerian Labour Congress, on Sunday, lamented the rising state of insecurity, delay in wage implementation by some states, and economic hardship among others experienced in in 2023.

The NLC President, Joe Ajaero, stated this in a New Year message he signed on Sunday and tagged, “2024 can be better if…”

Ajaero noted that the government has failed to deliver on its promises to Nigerians on the N35,000 national minimum wage as agreed by the Federal Government and the NLC.

He said during the year under review, Nigerians have faced uncertainties, overcome obstacles, and witnessed moments that may have left them feeling disheartened.

“In 2023, we witnessed two major agreements signed between the federal government and NLC and TUC. The June 5th and October 2nd Agreements. Whether these have been faithfully implemented or not is open for every discerning Nigerian to see.

“Nigerians will judge that by our actions thus far, we have demonstrated enormous patience with this government and have been accused and labelled as having been settled by the government but we recognize that this is part of the burden of leadership which we are prepared to bear to ensure that we do not only take the right actions but that they yield the expected results keeping our nation surviving as an entity and avoiding fifth columnists from taking advantage of the situation to destroy our nation.

“In all of these, this government has shown enormous unfaithfulness in keeping to agreements; the N35,000 Wage Award has not been faithfully implemented, the PH refinery has not come on stream as projected while the National Minimum Wage Negotiation Council has not been inaugurated as agreed, the CNG has been distorted by agents of government for the benefit of a few.

“Divisions along our various primordial fault lines rather than heal became exacerbated this year mainly as a result of the unfortunate activities of Politicians who played them up in their bid to win elections. Our nation has therefore become more divided than ever with growing suspicion and increasing trust deficits along those lines.

“Citizens’ confidence in the government is therefore deeply wounded causing a further disconnect between the people and governments as the government continues with policies that negate the welfare of citizens. We observe only a few pockets of progress in governance in some states but largely, the instruments of governance are mainly deployed for the sole benefit of those who believe they have captured the instruments of governance and thus use them for their sole benefit.

“2023 is also a year where we have seen the increasing use of violence and unrivalled propaganda as tools of engagement in the nation’s industrial relations sphere. The boundary between the tools used in electioneering and in actual governance seems to have been ruptured as the same mindless violence and crudity witnessed during the last election cycle is now being used by those in government as a weapon in managing workplace relations in Nigeria. We have witnessed the government’s interference in the internal affairs of trade unions all in a bid to capture the levers of power in these unions and use them to seek to hold the civic space in our nation hostage and thwart citizens’ efforts at holding the government accountable.”

The Congress also lamented the recent attack on the President of the Congress and the stoppage of the implementation of the wage award as agreed in the October, 2nd MOU between the federal government and Organised Labour.

“Such coincidence is ominous and raises a lot of questions in our hearts further justifying strongly our belief that the conspiracies to mete out violence against trade union leaders including the President of Congress in Owerri go to the very top.

“It is in furtherance of these efforts by the government that the November 1st bestial abduction and brutalization of the President of Congress; comrade Joe Ajaero and others by the Government and the Police in Owerri Imo state happened.

“We believe that Nigerians need to be reminded that the Imo state Government under Hope Uzodimma remains an ongoing haven for the abuse and violation of the rights and interests of workers. Many workers are still being owed years in arrears of salaries, Gratuities are in arrears, Pension is in arrears, and thousands of workers are still being declared as ghost workers while the NLC secretariat vandalized and stripped by the state government remains desolate. Some of those hitherto declared ghost workers whose names were re-inserted into the payroll as of November 2023 in an effort by the state government to cover its sins are still being owed huge arrears in salaries.

“It was in our effort at liberating the workers in the state from the pernicious hands of the state that the National Executive Council (NEC) of our Congress decided that we converge on Owerri to demand that the government obeys agreements that it had reached with us in an engagement that started from 2021 and continued at the beginning of this year until November. As usual, the propaganda machinery of the government oiled by the hijack of our collective resources was deployed in trying to hoodwink and mislead members of the public as to the reason for the Imo state protest. Thankfully, Nigerians refused to be misled.

“We therefore while once again condemning in strong terms that cowardly and brutal action by the Police and Imo state government, appreciate all Nigerian workers and masses including our civil society allies who trooped out in their numbers across the nation to take part in the ensuing nationwide strike that shut down the nation to protest the primitive use of violence and brigandage by the government against mass-based organisations and their leadership.

The success of that strike demonstrated the determination of Nigerians and workers to continue to act together to hold the government accountable at all times. We are encouraged and salute you all and assure you that we remain committed to our pledge to work for a better Nigeria where the interests of Nigerians especially the workforce will be projected and protected always.”

Ajaero also described 2023 as a turbulent year both for workers and Nigerian people as “the negative Economic policies of Government begin to bite harder on poor Nigerians as predicted. Workers continue to grapple with the worst forms of deprivations thus unable to meet their basic needs while transportation to work continues to be a nightmare. Nigerian masses have experienced the worst form of angst and suffering as access to basic nutrition has become more difficult while Education and basic social utilities have become the sole purview of the rich. This year’s festive season has been made so difficult for the masses that the usual joy associated with the season was replaced with worries and anxiety all over the nation.

“The government’s half-hearted attempts at providing succour were largely mere propaganda and never had any impact on the high cost of transportation across the nation. Our Naira continues in its free fall in all markets while Governments both federal and states continue in their reckless borrowing and spending in the name of governance.

We are worried at the haste with which those in government rush to eat the future of Nigerians by borrowing and frittering them away putting the future of our unborn generation in jeopardy. As it stands today, Nigeria needs about 12% more than our annual revenue to service our debt stock meaning that we have to borrow to ever be able to service our debts. Another debt trap has been unleashed on the population. Governments should act more responsibly in its debt activities.”

On cash scarcity, the NLC President said, “We are witnessing once again, Cash scarcity in our Economy. This time, the CBN tells us that it is because we are hoarding cash – a very sad excuse. We know that with our meagre incomes, we don’t have any leftover cash to hoard and so, if by any stretch of imagination, CBN’s excuse is real, we know those who are hoarding cash.

However, we do not see any sensible person who will hoard the Naira as a store of value at this time when the Naira is receiving its greatest bashing. The CBN should immediately inject cash into the economy to stop the exploitation of the Nigerian masses thus reducing the hardship. If CBN does not realize it, Nigerians as it stands today pay at least 5% of their money to free their money which it has held hostage.”

On the spate of attacks across the country, Ajaero added, “The wanton destruction of lives and properties continues unabated in 2023. The recent killings in Plateau and Taraba states during this yuletide are heart-rending and mind-boggling. That the blood of Nigerians flowed in the streets without any outrage across the nation shows that we may have lost our collective feeling of revulsion.

That our leaders chose this occasion to clink glasses and junket to pay homages instead of being in a sober mood to reflect on the degree of their failure to protect the lives of those who elected them into offices is utterly repugnant and smacks of the highest level of insensitivity. We are aghast at whether our leaders understand what their responsibilities are at all.

It is these combined forces of negative government policies that have created the worst form of social anomie in our nation. Nigerians have become more fearful of the future now more than ever before and are truly having their expectations dashed and their hopes betrayed by the ruling elite. It is in this dire mood that we end the year 2023 and in this condition that we move into the new year 2024.”

The NLC however, assured Nigerians that it will, in the New Year, be committed to the welfare of Nigerians and continue to fight for their cause from the government at all levels.

“NLC will be committed in 2024 towards ensuring that a living wage becomes possible for all Nigerian workers by working with others to secure a National Minimum Wage that approximates the dictates of the various parameters that make incomes humane and grants access to necessities of life for the average worker.

“We will recommit to building workplaces that guarantee the rights and privileges of workers while building the basis for continuous wealth creation for our nation. All actions that will therefore ensure that Decent work gaps are reduced to their barest minimum will be encouraged. We will therefore strengthen our collaboration with the federal Ministry of Labour, NECA and the TUC using the tripartite process to regulate the Industrial Relations space and ensure that the reviewed labour administration laws are forwarded to the National Assembly for passage into Law.

From every indication, 2024 will be an interesting year. Interesting because it will witness a period where all that has been taken away from workers will be restored. Any Private sector employer or Agency of Government that is therefore owing any Nigerian worker anywhere should be ready to pay up in 2024.

We will work in collaboration with our civil society partners to generate frameworks that will build stronger and more robust civic space which ensures that our voices are heard at all times and used to check and assist the government in taking the right actions that will make governance more effective and beneficial for the majority of the citizenry”, Ajaero said.
summary: The Nigerian Labour Congress (NLC) has expressed concerns over increasing insecurity, delay in wage implementation by some states, and economic hardship in 2023. The NLC President, Joe Ajaero, stated these concerns in a New Year message, titled, “2024 can be better if…” He accused the Nigerian government of failing to deliver on its promises to Nigerians on the N35,000 national minimum wage as agreed by the Federal Government and the NLC. He also criticised the use of violence and propaganda as tools of engagement in the nation's industrial relations sphere. The Congress also expressed concern over the recent attack on the President of the Congress and the stoppage of the implementation of the wage award as agreed in the October, 2nd MOU between the federal government and Organised Labour.

title: The clash between prime minister and criminal factions kills seven suspects in Curitiba
description: In a statement, the Military Police of Paraná specified that more than 50 gunshots were recorded in the action The clash between the military police and criminal factions resulted in the death of seven suspects in the early hours of this Sunday (31), in the Parolin neighborhood, in Curitiba. In…
content:
In a statement, the Military Police of Paraná specified that more than 50 gunshots were recorded in the action

The clash between the military police and criminal factions resulted in the death of seven suspects in the early hours of this Sunday (31), in the Parolin neighborhood, in Curitiba. In a statement, the Military Police of Paraná specified that more than 50 gunshots were recorded. According to the company, the officers were not injured in the action and a Military Police investigation will be opened for investigation and subsequent referral to the Public Prosecutor.

The first teams of the 12th Battalion d Military police (12 BPM) were met with gunfire of various calibers, including rifles. Special duty teams (BPRONE) were called and confronted the suspects.

According to Lieut Jonas da Silva Amaral Two ballistic vests with ceramic plates, 10 firearms and numerous ammunition were seized from the PMPR’s BPRONE and are still being counted.

“The war on drugs is strong and divided. […] During the week they set fire to houses in the region and today the individuals tried to retake that point, which is why they came so armed, with a ballistic vest, a long gun, which we have not found so far, and two Roni Kits .”the lieutenant said in an interview with CNN Brazil.

entities.data: the early hours of this Sunday

summary: The clash between the military police and criminal factions in Curitiba, Brazil, resulted in the death of seven suspects. The Military Police of Paraná recorded over 50 gunshots, but the officers were unharmed. The first teams of the 12th Battalion d Military police (12 BPM) were met with gunfire from various calibers, including rifles, and special duty teams (BPRONE) were called to confront the suspects. Two ballistic vests with ceramic plates, 10 firearms, and ammunition were seized from the PMPR's BPRONE. An investigation will be opened for investigation and referral to the Public Prosecutor.

title: ‘Bruna Marquezine’s pobi alone’: surrounded by couples, the actress causes discussion on the web about her love life
description: Bruna Marquezine was the only single among the friends who spent a pre-New Year party together in Pernambuco. In a photo of the couple the actress became a meme on the web. I wait! Bruna Marquezine, Juliet AND Sasha Meneghel they enjoyed Amoré's pre-New Year party, on Maracaípe beach, in…
content:
Bruna Marquezine was the only single among the friends who spent a pre-New Year party together in Pernambuco. In a photo of the couple the actress became a meme on the web. I wait!

Bruna Marquezine, Juliet AND Sasha Meneghel they enjoyed Amoré’s pre-New Year party, on Maracaípe beach, in Pernambuco. The event, which included a show In Anita until dawn there was still the presence of Luana MaiaBruna’s sister, who was accompanied by her boyfriend, João Fernando Alvariz.

Just like Luana, Juliette and Sasha were also a couple. The singer with Crossfit athlete Kaique Cerveny, with whom they recently made their relationship officialand the daughter of Xuxa with her husband John LukeWhat he changed his stage name when he moved from gospel to pop.

In one click with everyone together, Marquezine ended up “holding the candle” by appearing alone among the couples. And the artist, who mocked him liberation from no longer having Neymar in your lifehas become a topic on the web.

Internet users soon noticed the finished meme when they saw Bruna, the only single woman, in a couple photo. “In my love life my name is Bruna,” said a follower. “The photo of the couple and Bruna alone represent me a lot,” said one internet user. “Among my friends I am Bruna, alone, but happy,” said another. “Pobi Bruna Marquezine alone,” another fan said amusedly.

The year of 2023 has been very successful in Bruna Marquezine’s professional life. The actress starred in the long-awaited film “Blue Beetle” in theaters, which marked the Brazilian’s entry into the Hollywood circuit.

Furthermore, Bruna has also taken a further step forward in her career…

summary: Bruna Marquezine, an actress who was the only single among friends at a pre-New Year party in Pernambuco, has caused discussion online about her love life. A photo of her with her boyfriend, João Fernando Alvariz, and their daughter with Crossfit athlete Kaique Cerveny sparked a meme. Internet users identified the photo as a representation of themselves, with some believing that Marrezine's appearance alone among the couples represents them. The actress also starred in the film “Blue Beetle” which marked her entry into Hollywood. Her career also saw success, with a successful video in Times Square and criticism for being labeled “the first Brazilian leading lady".

title: 10'000 Raketen erhellen in der Silvesternacht das Zürcher Seebecken
description: Tausende Schaulustige sind in Zürich kurz nach Mitternacht mit einem grossen Feuerwerk ins neue Jahr gestartet. Während 15 Minuten erhellten rund 10'000 Raketen das Seebecken. Abgefeuert wurden sie von drei Booten auf dem Zürichsee.
content:
Tausende Schaulustige sind in Zürich kurz nach Mitternacht mit einem grossen Feuerwerk ins neue Jahr gestartet. Während 15 Minuten erhellten rund 10'000 Raketen das Seebecken. Abgefeuert wurden sie von drei Booten auf dem Zürichsee.

Der Verein «Silvesterzauber» erwartete rund 150'000 Zuschauerinnen und Zuschauer. Schon im Vorfeld wies die Stadtpolizei Zürich darauf hin, dass das Abbrennen von privatem Feuerwerk strengstes verboten ist. Die Veranstalter und die Polizei führten Kontrollen durch.

Wer mit Raketen und Böllern inmitten der Menschenmassen erwischt wurde, musste mit einer Busse oder je nach Art des Vorfalls einer Verzeigung rechnen. Das Feuerwerk wurde zudem eingezogen.

Für den «Silvesterzauber» wurden Teile der Innenstadt und das ganze Seebecken für den Verkehr gesperrt. Damit die Zuschauerinnen und Zuschauer nach dem Feuerwerk sicher nach Hause kommen, betreibt der Zürcher Verkehrsverbund bis 04.00 Uhr morgens einen Spezialfahrplan.
translation:
Thousands of onlookers started the new year in Zurich shortly after midnight with a large fireworks display. Around 10,000 rockets illuminated the lake basin for 15 minutes. They were fired from three boats on Lake Zurich.

The “Silvesterzauber” club expected around 150,000 spectators. The Zurich city police had already pointed out in advance that setting off private fireworks was strictly prohibited. The organizers and the police carried out checks.

Anyone caught with rockets and firecrackers in the middle of the crowds faced a fine or, depending on the nature of the incident, a reprimand. The fireworks were also withdrawn.

For the “New Year’s Eve magic,” parts of the city center and the entire lake basin were closed to traffic. To ensure that spectators get home safely after the fireworks, the Zurich Transport Association operates a special timetable until 4 a.m. in the morning.
translated_title: 10,000 rockets illuminate the Zurich lake basin on New Year's Eve
translated_description: Thousands of onlookers started the new year in Zurich shortly after midnight with a large fireworks display. Around 10,000 rockets illuminated the lake basin for 15 minutes. They were fired from three boats on Lake Zurich.
translated_summary: Thousands of spectators gathered for a fireworks display on New Year's Eve in Zurich, which saw around 10,000 rockets illuminated the lake basin for 15 minutes. The "Silvesterzauber" club expected around 150,000 spectators. The Zurich city police prohibited setting off private fireworks, which were subject to fines or reprimands depending on the severity of the incident. The area around the lake and lake basin were closed to traffic during the event, with the Zurich Transport Association operating a special timetable to ensure safety.

title: Detiene Fuerza Estatal a hombre con orden de aprehensión por conspiración y distribución de fentanilo
description: MEXICALI,DICIEMBRE 31, 2023.- Un trabajo coordinado y el intercambio de información entre autoridades de Estados Unidos y la Secretaría de Seguridad Ciudadana de Baja California (SSCBC), permitió la detención, en la ciudad de Mexicali, de un hombre que contaba con orden de aprehensión por los delitos de Conspiración y Distribución de Fentanilo en la Unión […]
content:
MEXICALI,DICIEMBRE 31, 2023.- Un trabajo coordinado y el intercambio de información entre autoridades de Estados Unidos y la Secretaría de Seguridad Ciudadana de Baja California (SSCBC), permitió la detención, en la ciudad de Mexicali, de un hombre que contaba con orden de aprehensión por los delitos de Conspiración y Distribución de Fentanilo en la Unión Americana.

El sujeto identificado como Luis Alfredo “N” alias “Wicho” se encontraba internado en el Centro de Reinserción Social (CERESO) de la ciudad de Mexicali en cumplimento a una condena por delitos dictados en México, y una vez concluido su tiempo en prisión dictado por un juez se le otorgó libertad, sin embargo, era requerido por las autoridades del vecino país desde el mes de junio del año 2022.

Fue por esta razón que agentes de la Coordinación de Enlace Internacional de la Fuerza Estatal de Seguridad Ciudadana (FESC) lo aprehendieron, para posteriormente, con apoyo del Instituto Nacional de Migración (INM) entregarlo a las autoridades de Estados Unidos, quienes lo requerían.

La SSCBC refrenda el compromiso de seguir trabajando de la mano con las autoridades involucradas con la seguridad de México, así como con las autoridades en el extranjero, a fin de no permitir que Baja California sea una opción para que quienes cometan un delito evadan la justicia; en nuestro Estado la seguridad somos todas y todos.
translation:
MEXICALI, DECEMBER 31, 2023.- A coordinated work and exchange of information between United States authorities and the Secretariat of Citizen Security of Baja California (SSCBC), allowed the arrest, in the city of Mexicali, of a man who had arrest warrant for the crimes of Conspiracy and Distribution of Fentanyl in the American Union.

The subject identified as Luis Alfredo “N” alias “Wicho” was admitted to the Social Reintegration Center (CERESO) in the city of Mexicali in compliance with a sentence for crimes issued in Mexico, and once his time in prison had ended. By a judge he was granted freedom, however, he was required by the authorities of the neighboring country since June 2022.

It was for this reason that agents of the International Liaison Coordination of the State Citizen Security Force (FESC) apprehended him, and later, with the support of the National Migration Institute (INM), handed him over to the United States authorities, who required him.

The SSCBC reaffirms the commitment to continue working hand in hand with the authorities involved in the security of Mexico, as well as with authorities abroad, in order to not allow Baja California to be an option for those who commit a crime to evade justice. ; In our State, security is all of us.
translated_title: State Force detains man with arrest warrant for conspiracy and distribution of fentanyl
translated_description: MEXICALI, DECEMBER 31, 2023.- A coordinated work and exchange of information between United States authorities and the Secretariat of Citizen Security of Baja California (SSCBC), allowed the arrest, in the city of Mexicali, of a man who had arrest warrant for the crimes of Conspiracy and Distribution of Fentanyl in the Union […]
translated_summary: A coordinated arrest led to the arrest of Luis Alfredo “N” alias “Wicho” in the city of Mexicali, Mexico, for the crimes of Conspiracy and Distribution of Fentanyl in the American Union. The subject, who was admitted to the Social Reintegration Center (CERESO) in Mexico in compliance with a sentence for crimes issued in Mexico, had been granted freedom by a judge after his time in prison. However, since June 2022, he has been required by the authorities of the neighboring country. Agents from the State Citizen Security Force apprehended him and handed him over to the United States authorities. The Secretariat of Citizen Security of Baja California (SSCBC) pledged to continue working with authorities involved in Mexico's security and abroad to prevent crime from being an option for those who commit a crime to evade justice.

title: Inwestycja za blisko 9 mln zł na składowisku odpadów. Powstanie farma fotowoltaiczna
description: Na terenie Miejskiego Składowiska Odpadów Komunalnych przy ul. Cmentarnej w Zabrzu powstanie ekologiczna farma fotowoltaiczna. Realizacja inwestycji wartej blisko 9 mln zł rozpocznie się na początku 2024 roku, a zakończy za niemal dwa lata.    Miejski Ośrodek
content:
Na terenie Miejskiego Składowiska Odpadów Komunalnych przy ul. Cmentarnej w Zabrzu powstanie ekologiczna farma fotowoltaiczna. Realizacja inwestycji wartej blisko 9 mln zł rozpocznie się na początku 2024 roku, a zakończy za niemal dwa lata.

Miejski Ośrodek Sportu i Rekreacji w Zabrzu wybuduje ekologiczną elektrownię o mocy 1,72 MWp. Zajmie ona powierzchnię około 3 hektarów.

Pozyskana z ogniw słonecznych energia elektryczna będzie odprowadzana do sieci zbiorczej zakładu energetycznego Tauron S.A., następnie poprzez wzajemne rozliczenia wykorzystana na potrzeby wszystkich obiektów MOSiR w Zabrzu Sp. z o.o., zaś pozostały nadmiar zostanie sprzedany.

– Dla tej inwestycji Spółka przez okres trzech minionych lat pozyskiwała niezbędne dokumenty, ekspertyzy geotechniczne, sanitarne, decyzję środowiskową, decyzję o warunkach zabudowy, podpisana została umowa z Tauron, a w okresie przedświątecznym kluczowa umowa tj.: umowa z Wojewódzkim Funduszem Ochrony Środowiska i Gospodarki Wodnej w Katowicach na finansowanie inwestycji w wysokości 7,25 mln zł na preferencyjnych warunkach – informuje miasto.

Wartość całej inwestycji szacowana jest na kwotę 8,8 mln zł. Kwota pożyczki stanowi 85,14 proc. kosztów kwalifikowanych. Rozpoczęcie budowy ma nastąpić na początku roku, a zakończenie przedsięwzięcia planowane jest na 30 listopada 2025 r.
translation:
On the premises of the Municipal Waste Landfill at ul. An ecological photovoltaic farm will be built in Cmentarna in Zabrze. The investment, worth nearly PLN 9 million, will start at the beginning of 2024 and will be completed in almost two years.

The Municipal Sports and Recreation Center in Zabrze will build an ecological power plant with a capacity of 1.72 MWp. It will occupy an area of ​​approximately 3 hectares.

The electricity obtained from solar cells will be transferred to the collective network of the Tauron S.A. energy plant, and then, through mutual settlements, used for the needs of all facilities of MOSiR w Zabrzu Sp. z o. o., and the remaining surplus will be sold.

– For this investment, over the past three years, the Company has obtained the necessary documents, geotechnical and sanitary expertise, an environmental decision, a decision on development conditions, an agreement with Tauron was signed, and in the pre-Christmas period, a key agreement, i.e. an agreement with the Provincial Fund for Environmental Protection and Water Management in Katowice to finance investments in the amount of PLN 7.25 million on preferential terms - informs the city.

The value of the entire investment is estimated at PLN 8.8 million. The loan amount is 85.14 percent. eligible costs. Construction is scheduled to begin at the beginning of the year, and the project is scheduled to be completed on November 30, 2025.

The investment will start in 2024 and be completed within two years. The Municipal Sports and Recreation Center in Zablizi will build an ecological power plant with a capacity of 1.72 MWp. The electricity from solar cells will be transferred to the Tauron S.A. energy plant and used for the needs of all facilities of MOSiR w Zablzu Sp. z o. o.
